oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Left Displaced Abomasum: To Toggle or not to Toggle, that is the Question!
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DesCôteaux, Luc
Woods-Lavoie, Eve
Cecyre, André
Larouche, Yves
Rioux, Robert
Dubreuil, Pascal
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: left displaced abomasums
toggle pin fixation
omentopexy
risk factor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An observational study was conducted from October 1998 to April 2000 on 215 cows diagnosed with left displaced abomasums (LDA) to evaluate risk factors associated with success of the toggle pin fixation procedure (n=108) and the omentopexy (n=107).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2001; 167
